jobDetails.title: Senior Human Resources Representative
jobDetails.description: We're looking for an experienced and versatile Senior Human Resources Representative to join our dynamic HR team at our technology company in Bengaluru. With 10 years of comprehensive HR experience, you'll be a key player, contributing across all major HR divisions. This role is perfect for a seasoned HR professional who thrives in a fast-paced tech environment and is passionate about building a strong, employee-centric culture. Responsibilities: You'll be responsible for a wide range of HR functions, often acting as a point person across multiple domains. Your duties will include: Talent Acquisition & Onboarding: Collaborate with hiring managers to understand staffing needs, define job requirements, and develop effective recruitment strategies for various tech roles. Manage the full recruitment life cycle, from sourcing and screening candidates (including leveraging social media, job boards, and professional networks) to coordinating interviews and extending offers. Negotiate compensation packages, ensuring market competitiveness while adhering to company budgets. Oversee a smooth and efficient onboarding process for new hires, ensuring they're well-integrated into the company culture and have all necessary resources. Conduct pre-joining formalities, background checks, and documentation in compliance with Indian labor laws. Employee Relations & Engagement: Serve as a trusted point of contact for employees, a...
jobDetails.keywords: Human Resources, HR, Talent Acquisition, Onboarding, Recruitment, Employee Relations, Engagement, Compliance
